org.clapper.curn.parser
Interface RSSLinkChangeListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
RSSLinkChangeListenerAdapter
public interface RSSLinkChangeListener

Implements a change listener for RSSLink objects. An RSSLink object can be associated with change listeners that fire if the RSSLink object is changed. This capability exists primarily to permit underlying parser adapters to detect when a link has been changed (e.g., by a plug-in).

Method Summary

          Fired when the link type is changed.
